title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 25, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 25, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Lit
items.content_text:
### Starter Templates

*   [Vite Lit Starter (⭐74k)](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/tree/main/packages/create-vite/template-lit) - Lit based template preset for Vite.
*   [Vite Lit TS Starter (⭐74k)](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/tree/main/packages/create-vite/template-lit-ts) - Lit and TypeScript based template preset for Vite.

### Extensions

*   [`@stefanholzapfel/lit-state`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@stefanholzapfel/lit-state) - Lightweight reactive state management for Lit 2.

### Design Systems

*   [Outline Design System (⭐131)](https://github.com/phase2/outline) - Web component based design system starter kit.

### Integrations / Other Tools

*   [Bridgetown Lit Renderer (⭐13)](https://github.com/bridgetownrb/bridgetown-lit-renderer) - SSR + hydration of Lit components for Bridgetown.
items.content_html:
Starter Templates

  • Vite Lit Starter (⭐74k) - Lit based template preset for Vite.
  • Vite Lit TS Starter (⭐74k) - Lit and TypeScript based template preset for Vite.

Extensions

  • @stefanholzapfel/lit-state - Lightweight reactive state management for Lit 2.

Design Systems

  • Outline Design System (⭐131) - Web component based design system starter kit.

Integrations / Other Tools

  • Bridgetown Lit Renderer (⭐13) - SSR + hydration of Lit components for Bridgetown.

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### Analytics

*   [Pirsch](https://pirsch.io/) - Privacy-friendly web analytics with a backend integration and API.

### Authentication & Identity

*   [Oso](https://www.osohq.com/) - Authorization framework (RBAC).

### Media

*   [Pintura](https://pqina.nl/pintura) - A fully configurable JavaScript image editor SDK.
items.content_html:
Analytics

  • Pirsch - Privacy-friendly web analytics with a backend integration and API.

Authentication & Identity

  • Oso - Authorization framework (RBAC).

Media

  • Pintura - A fully configurable JavaScript image editor SDK.

items.title: Awesome Raspberry Pi
items.content_text:
### Tools

*   [Pi-Apps (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/Botspot/pi-apps) - The most popular app store for Raspberry Pi computers, 100% open-source bash scripts.
items.content_html:
Tools

  • Pi-Apps (⭐2.4k) - The most popular app store for Raspberry Pi computers, 100% open-source bash scripts.

items.title: Awesome Pentest
items.content_text:
### Exfiltration Tools / Zealandia

*   [QueenSono (⭐147)](https://github.com/ariary/QueenSono) - Client/Server Binaries for data exfiltration with ICMP. Useful in a network where ICMP protocol is less monitored than others (which is a common case).
items.content_html:
Exfiltration Tools / Zealandia

  • QueenSono (⭐147) - Client/Server Binaries for data exfiltration with ICMP. Useful in a network where ICMP protocol is less monitored than others (which is a common case).
